channel.title: Hotel Madhuvan on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Hotel Madhuvan on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Chokhi Dhani- Jaipur
item.description: Last day at Jaipur, today we have kept ourselves more or less free for shopping. Had breakfast at hotel lawn for the first time. The buffet breakfast at Hotel Madhuvan worth only when you have time to enjoy it. We met one Indian family who were travelling from Gujrat for the Diwali weekend to Jaipur and wanted to join us at Chokhi Dhani later in the evening. Around 10 we left for shopping with Mr.
